text.div:
Capecitabine (Recurrent/Metastatic)

Course:

Name: Capecitabine

Agent Protocols Options:

Capecitabine 1000-1250 mg/m^2 PO twice daily D1-14

Offset: None

Cycle length: Q21D

dosageInstruction.text: Capecitabine 1000 mg/m^2 PO twice daily D1-14

text.div:
AC followed by Paclitaxel + Trastuzumab Course 2

Name: Paclitaxel in Dose-dense Paclitaxel (Q14D) + Trastuzumab (Q7D)

Course: 2

Agent Protocols Options:

Paclitaxel 175 mg/m^2 IV over 3 hours D1 in cycles 1-4

Offset: None

Cycle length: Q14D x 4 cycles

dosageInstruction.text: Paclitaxel 175 mg/m^2 IV over 3 hours D1
